long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Layout Guide is here! This tool helps you check the alignment of your design both in the Webflow Designer and on your live site.

Layout Guide is part of the Flowing tool pack. We are currently in the Beta version of Flowing, a comprehensive utility pack designed to help Webflow developers deliver high-quality websites.

Flowing includes a variety of tools, such as an interactive checklist, collections of high-quality code and components, and utility tools like this Layout Guide.
